events.comment: Explain what the variable does here:
WIP
Position the hands and legs on the "body", the legs and hands have variables called "leg.type" and "hand.type" respectively.
set angle of the hand and leg to the body angle.
Set the current state of the object variable "animation" of "body" to the current animation state, this can be used to get the current animation state of the body
The timer is used to handle the hands and legs shuffling
we use the body speed divided by 1000 to as a condition to shuffle hands. By adding 180 to the angle of hands and legs we get the direct opposite of the angle that way we have a shuffle
body is not moving set the scale of teh hands and legs to 0 so they are both not visible.x
if player is holding his  phone bring out right hand and hide left hand
Player is moving while holding his phone, shuffle legs to simulate walk
Player is not moving while holding his phone hide the legs
Player is moving while holding his phone, shuffle legs to simulate walk
Player is not moving while holding his phone hide the legs
hand should appear below body and legs below hand
center camera on player
set the variable "Game.Camera.Zoom" to 1, the camera uses this to set it's zoom level
Revert to the "Game.Camera.Zoom" variable if GodMode is not active
Move "body" away from all these objects
In rooms
Handle movement with "wasd" and only move when the object variable "Movement.canMove" of player is possible
Reveert to values set in the body ovject variable "Body.Movement.TopDownMovement.*****"
